Class BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob<Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job
      • com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.qos.BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob<Result>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseJobUploadMedia, JobAddMessageThreadMember, JobDeleteMessageReceived, JobDeleteMessageThread, JobDeleteMessageThreadMember, JobDeleteMessageThreads, JobGetFriends, JobGetMessagesReceived, JobGetMessagesSent, JobGetMessageThread, JobGetMessageThreadMembers, JobGetMessageThreadMessages, JobGetMessageThreads, JobGetRelationships, JobLoginUser, JobPostEchoNotification, JobPostMessage, JobPostMessageThread, JobPostMessageThreadMessage, JobPostSocialUserCredential, JobPutRelationship, JobRegisterUser, JobUpdateMessageThread, JobUserUpdateGcmRegistrationId

    public abstract class BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob<Result>
extends Job

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob.OnJobAddedListener<T extends BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob>
      Callback to take appropriate action when the Job#onAdded() method execution without the need to subclass a this job to override it's Job#onAdded() method.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdded

        public void onAdded()
        To implement custom actions in this method either subclass and override this method or call setOnJobAddedListener(OnJobAddedListener). The default implementation will delegate to onAdded().

      • getOnJobAddedListener

        public BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob.OnJobAddedListener getOnJobAddedListener()
        Get the current listener for the Job#onAdded() callback.
        Returns:
        listener

      • setOnJobAddedListener

        public void setOnJobAddedListener(BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob.OnJobAddedListener onJobAddedListener)
        Add a listener for the Job#onAdded() callback.
        Parameters:
        onJobAddedListener - listener

      • onCancel

        protected void onCancel()
        Functionality implemented in shouldReRunOnThrowable(Throwable, int, int) where we have access to the Throwable}

      • shouldReRunOnThrowable

        protected RetryConstraint shouldReRunOnThrowable(Throwable throwable,
                                     int runCount,
                                     int maxRunCount)
        Default implementation delegates to DefaultRetryPolicyProvider.shouldReRunOnThrowable(BaseRetryPolicyAwareJob, Throwable, int, int). Override to implement custom retry policy, if the returned value is RetryConstraint#CANCEL it is developers responsibility to call postFailure(Throwable) in the overridden implementation.
        Parameters:
        throwable -
        runCount -
        maxRunCount -
        Returns:

      • postFailure

        protected abstract void postFailure(Throwable throwable)
        Implement this method to post a failure IJobEvent on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()
        Parameters:
        throwable - cause of job failure

      • onRun

        public void onRun()
           throws Throwable
        Same as calling syncRun(boolean true)
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • syncRun

        public abstract Result syncRun(boolean postEvent)
                        throws Throwable
        Implement this method to do the actual work the job needs to perform. Eg. Call network, updated DB, etc.
        Parameters:
        postEvent - if true the method is expected to post a IJobEvent with result.
        Returns:
        job result
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • getRetryLimit

        protected int getRetryLimit()
        Returns:
        the same value as getMaxAttempts().
